author_name: Ǧalāl ad-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad al-Maḥallī

tafsir_name: Aysar at-tafāsīr: tafsīr, asbāb nuzūl, aḥādīṯ, namāḏiǧ iʿrāb

author_name: Muḥammad ibn Ahmad ibn Ǧuzayy al-Ġarnāṭī

tafsir_name: al-Kaššāf ʿan ḥaqāʾiq ġawāmiḍ at-tanzīl wa-ʿuyūn al-aqāwīl fī wuǧūh at-taʾwīl
Ǧāmiʿ al-bayān ʿan taʾwīl āy al-Qurʾān
Iršād al-ʿaql as-salīm ilā mazāyā al-kitāb al-karīm

author_name: Muḥammad al-Amīn ibn Muḥammad al-Muḫtār ibn ʿAbd al-Qādir al-Ǧakanī aš-Šanqīṭī
tafsir_name: Aḍwāʾ al-bayān fī īḍāḥ al-Qurʾān bi-l-Qurʾān
Tafsīr Bayān as-saʿāda fī maqāmāt al-ʿibāda
